plot: A man with a squeaky shoe quickly becomes an outcast and must do everything his power to fix the problem which he does with unexpected results.
title: Squeaky Shoe
plot_es: A man with a squeaky shoe quickly becomes an outcast and must do everything his power to fix the problem which he does with unexpected results.
plot_en: A man with a squeaky shoe quickly becomes an outcast and must do everything his power to fix the problem which he does with unexpected results.
